trans-unit.source: Dynamically performs hit testing on a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Utfører dynamisk treffprosent tester på en <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The IncrementalHitTester dynamically determines whether the user "hits" a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: IncrementalHitTester bestemmer dynamisk om brukeren "treff" <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: This class enables you to provide immediate feedback to the user in situations such as selecting and erasing ink.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan du distribuere umiddelbare til brukeren i situasjoner, for eksempel velge og sletting av farge.

trans-unit.source: There are two classes that inherit from IncrementalHitTester: - The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> hit tests strokes by determining whether a lasso path surrounds it.
trans-unit.target: Det er to klasser som arver fra IncrementalHitTester:- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester>truffet tester streker ved å fastsette om en lasso bane omgir det.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> hit tests strokes by determining where an eraser path intersects it.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>Truffet tester streker ved å fastsette der en Viskelær bane krysser det.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists where to learn how to manage digital ink on a custom control.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser hvor du vil lære å administrere digitale farge på en egendefinert kontroll.

trans-unit.source: |To do this…|See this article| |-----------------|----------------------| |Create a control that collects digital ink|[Creating an Ink Input Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |Create a control that enables the user to select ink|[How to: Select Ink from a Custom Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |Create a control that enables the user to point-erase ink|[How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| ## XAML Text Usage This class is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: | For å gjøre dette... | Se denne artikkelen | |-----------------|----------------------| | Opprette en kontroll som samler inn digital farge | [Oppretter en farge inndata kontrollen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| | Opprette en kontroll som gjør det mulig at brukeren velger farge | [Slik: Velg farge fra en egendefinert kontroll](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| | Opprette en kontroll som lar brukeren punkt Tøm farge | [Slik: tømme farge på en egendefinert kontroll](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) | ## XAML teksten Bruk denne klassen brukes vanligvis ikke i XAML.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds points to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Legger til peker til den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av typen <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> til å legge til den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Legger til den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objekter til den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En samling av <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objekter til å legge til den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds points to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Legger til peker til den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The points to add
trans-unit.target: Peker til å legge til

trans-unit.source: Releases resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call the EndHitTesting method when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester> finishes hit testing.
trans-unit.target: Kall metoden EndHitTesting når den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester>er ferdig nådde testing.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester>

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref> is hit testing.
trans-unit.target: Henter om den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"> </xref> er nådde testing.

trans-unit.source: The IsValid returns `true` until <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester.EndHitTesting%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer IsValid `true` før <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester.EndHitTesting%2A>kalles.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester.EndHitTesting%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then it returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Deretter returneres `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref> is hit testing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"> </xref> er nådde testing; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
